QueryToExecute:
select
  arn as resource,
  case
    when transit_encryption_enabled then 'ok'
    else 'alarm'
  end as status,
  case
    when transit_encryption_enabled then title || ' encryption in transit enabled.'
    else title || ' encryption in transit disabled.'
  end as reason
  , region, account_id
from
  aws_elasticache_replication_group;
